OOC: Hahaha! You don't have to like wrestling to be my friend, Azure! Don't=
 worry!...

 Re: Lynxiz - Lokk - Axis


  IC: Starstomp had lost Sixshot. She turned he=
r attention to Windlord 
  fighting Vampiza. However, they were fighting wa=
y too high for her to reach 
  Vampiza.

  Starstomp:
  Windlord, bring tha=
t fireball-boy down a bit so I can attack him!

  OOC: I dont like wrestlin=
g... I never even watched it, and I'm not 
  interested... Am I still your =
friend? :_-(

iz / Axis / Lokk ---
  >
  >   Lynxiz enters the Chivitron base, and heads =
for the CR chambers.
  >   Trinity was looking pale, but would likely survi=
ve the ordeal. As she
  >   enters the CR room, she spots Burning Hammer on=
 the ground
  >   unconcious, "Burning Hammer? Uhh, hello?" She puts Trinit=
y into
  >   an empty (obviously =3DP) CR chamber, and starts the process
 =
 >   knowing that the small bot will be done soon. Then she turns to
  >   =
BH, "Hmmm, you don't look so good..." She kneels beside him,
  >   and exam=
ines him, looking for a reason for his unconcious state.
  >
  >   Meanwhil=
e, outside the Chivitron base, Lokk is still hiding behind
  >   the hill. =
He spots Windlord fighting close combat with Vampiza,
  >   and grumbles, n=
ot wanting to shoot and damage his fellow
  >   Chivitron. He picks out Ape=
wing, and his twin chainguns unload
  >   half a clip each, hoping to surpr=
ise the bot.
  >
  >   Axis peeks his head over the pod, and spots Speed Vi=
per. He fires
  >   a laser blast, then arcs a missile at the bot. Then he =
crouches
  >   back behind the pod.
  >

 Roland the Last Gunslinger wrote:

TER LEAVE WWF FAST BECAUSE THEIR SHIP IS
  >   > SINKING! LONG LIVE THE ERA=

essage, I won't kill you. I'm sadly not

  >   > marks, we're just trying=
 to have a little fun...

plex in a CR Chamber, turns around,
  >   > and suddenly falls on the floor=
